your midwife or doctor will 
suggest a date to have your 
labour	induced	(started	off)	
usually	10–14	days	after	your	
due date. If you don’t want 
labour to be induced and your 
pregnancy continues to 42 
weeks or beyond, you and 
your baby will be monitored. 
Your midwife or doctor will 
check that both you and 
your baby are healthy by 
giving you ultrasound scans 
and checking your baby’s 
movement and heartbeat. If
